revised_title: Further Observations on Tidal Streams in the English Channel and North Sea
tldr: Captain F. W. Beechey's report on further observations of tidal streams in the English Channel and North Sea, conducted under the Admiralty in 1849 and 1850. The study investigates the influence of combined waves on tidal phenomena and the simultaneous turn of the stream throughout the Channel, providing valuable insights for navigation and understanding of ocean currents.
